description:
If you are only wet weather curious or you just don’t want fenders on your bike all the time, these clip-on fenders are easy to pop on when you need them and off when you don’t. Whether you’re commuting and want to keep your clothes clean for the office, or just don’t fancy getting water thrown at your from above and below, these clip-on fenders have you covered.

  • Adjustable positioning lets you match the fit to your bike
  • No fender eyelets needed for installation
  • Easy to pop on and off
  • 45mm width helps catch extra spray
  • Works with most disc brakes
name: MEC Urban/Gravel Clip-On Bike Fenders
